availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Washington County, Kentucky, attorney. Kentucky native. Married Harriet Browne. Attorney and farmer in Washington County in 1860. Practiced law with John W. Lewis.

bibl.p: History of the Ohio Falls Cities and Their Counties: General history. History of Jefferson County, Ky. The history of Louisville(Clark County, Indiana: L. A. Williams & Company, 1882), 504; The Biographical Encyclop√¶dia of Kentucky of the Dead and Living Men of the Nineteenth Century, Volume 1 (Cincinnati: J. M. Armstrong, 1878), 336. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Washington County, District No. 2, p. 1.
